main.title: Scan a product label
main.description: Use your camera or upload an image to recognize product codes and get inventory information.

camera.title: Scan a product label
camera.description: Use your camera or upload an image to recognize product codes and get inventory information.

capture.title: Capture
capture.description: Open your camera and capture a clear photo of the product label.

ocr.title: OCR
ocr.description: The system automatically recognizes the product code using artificial intelligence.

info.title: Information
info.description: Get details like price, stock, and location of the product in the warehouse.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Works without internet connection. Load your data once.

qr.title: QR Code
qr.description: Scan this QR code to access the application

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your API keys?
settings.warning: Keys are stored encrypted on the server. You will not be able to recover them after deletion.

warehouse.title: Warehouse Entry
warehouse.description: Register parts entry to warehouse with photos and details
warehouse.scanDescription: Capture a photo of the reference label or enter manually
warehouse.photosDescription: Capture one or more photos of the part
warehouse.successMessage: The entry has been registered successfully in the warehouse
warehouse.requiresPhoto: At least one photo is required
